P

proximity - Variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
An integer with four possible values representing a general idea of how far the iBeacon is away
PROXIMITY_FAR - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
More than four meters away
PROXIMITY_IMMEDIATE - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
Less than half a meter away
PROXIMITY_NEAR - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
More than half a meter away, but less than four meters away
PROXIMITY_UNKNOWN - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
No distance estimate was possible due to a bad RSSI value or measured TX power
proximityUuid - Variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
A 16 byte UUID that typically represents the company owning a number of iBeacons Example: E2C56DB5-DFFB-48D2-B060-D0F5A71096E0
proximityUuid - Variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.Region
Part 1 of 3 of an iBeacon identifier.

setRangeNotifier(RangeNotifier) - Method in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeaconManager

Tells the IBeaconService to start looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object, and providing updates on the estimated distance very seconds while iBeacons in the Region are visible.

T

TAG - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.service.IBeaconService
 
txPower - Variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
The calibrated measured Tx power of the iBeacon in RSSI This value is baked into an iBeacon when it is manufactured, and it is transmitted with each packet to aid in the distance estimate
